评论详情: This is a beautiful skirt that I'll be able to wear for all four seasons. I was a little panicked when I got the package because it showed a pair of Palazzo pants. Go ahead and open the package because it'll be what you ordered. This skirt is as fine the quality as one that I've paid three times the price for. Enjoy.
Size up, too small and the ties are too short. Extremely cheap
Good attractive colours. Holds up in wash. Adjustable. I'm 5'3 105-115lbs. Size med.  The manufacturer should also consider making skirts without the ties-halter top

I bought this as a gift for my Artistic Boho stylish cousin.  She loves the fabric and the colors. Her one complaint is that it runs a tad small. which surprised me as it looks like it is rather roomy in the pictures...it fits her so she is keeping it.

I bought this to wear on a cruise.  I like that it can be worn as a skirt or a dress.  The colors are nice.  The fabric is good.  It's very flowy.  I'm very sensitive to the feel of fabrics and this does not bother me.  I purchased a size small.  I'm 5'5 155lbs.  It's a bit snug in the waste and butt area but that's where all my weight is.  If your booty isnt as bubbly than it should be fine :)

Less than a year and the "strap/tie" has completely come unstitched. Bought with the intention to wear as skirt or dress... but never fit the chest right- so just used as skirt- which is fine. Material was on the heavy side. But love the colors and still wear it.
So perfect I bought 3!!! Colors are great and beautiful. Very comfortable. Patterns are beautiful too!! Tank top and flip flops you’re good to go!!

This skirt is perfect. It is the right length at my ankles and is soo soft. It flows and is a beautiful deep color of red and purple. I I know I will wear it often!

It’s pretty but it does not fit as advertised. Size up when ordering. The seam where the flowing skirt meets the top has zero give and would not stretch over my hips. For reference, I’m 130lbs with a 26” waist and ordered a small. I was able to fit it on over my head and slide it down but the skirt sat much higher on me due to the seam that would not go further than my bum.
Nice design right size

I love this skirt... It is so beautiful! I love the patterns, the colors and it fits well. I am 5'8" and and weigh approximately 195 lbs and the XL fit perfectly. The skirt is very light & flowy. I like the way it's elastic around the waist but also has more support when you tie it around your waist as well. I recieved a lot of compliments when I wore it. I am really happy with my purchase.
Exactly as pictured!

评论概述: Cute. Runs Small. Ties too short.
评论详情: This is a cute skirt. It's thin and lightweight. It's lined, so it's not see-through, but it's very flowy. It runs a bit small, but I read the reviews and ordered a size up, so that's fine. The picture that says it can be worn as a dress is a bit misleading. While you technically could do it like that, the ties are so short, you'd have to wear it up to your neck to tie it. As a skirt, though, it's nearly perfect.  Mine arrived late, so I'm returning it and won't be able to answer questions about durability or washability. (I'm not sure if that's a UPS problem or an Amazon problem, but it's becoming a constant problem.)

WHY? Just add better thread, better material,  and restyle the top to fit like a skirt not a top.  Offer two ways! Such a shame! It is beautiful until you put it on. Too thin, too cheap, and fits awkward on top as a skirt.
I love these skirts, I have them in multiple styles and wear daily, I’d recommend hang drying though.

Sure, this skirt is STINKIN' CUTE!  That's why I ordered it.  However, it is  made out of Rayon, the worst-wearing fabric known to humankind.  It did come came with instructions saying to handwash and hang to dry, but who has time for that?  Besides, based on past experience, Rayon never looks good after it's been washed. I don't care how much you baby it.If the fabric still doesn't intimidate you,  go for it.  Just be sure to order UP a size or two!  I ordered a M, as I usually do, but couldn't  even get this baby up past my thighs.  Sadly, it is going back.

评论概述: basically as described , including customer comments
评论详情: The package arrived stating Bajamath PANTS , however , after unpacking, it is the skirt.  This is definitely you get what you pay for. Being as I will only wear it occasionally, it will be fine.  It is very light weight and thin, but will do  . Unless you like a tight waist  (or have a small waist to body ratio, definitely size up from your usual.

Full disclaimer, the first skirt I purchased I had to return for a larger size as it seems the sizing is a bit off. I would recommend sizing at least one size up and if you are clothing sensitive two sizes up (there is an elastic waste that is very stretchy but for us sensitive people, a bit suffocating if not properly sized). The material is really nice and light. Quality is great so far although definitely wash by hand and dry flat/so not put in dryer. Shipping and returns were so easy for the product. 10/10 experience and when I finally got the right size. Highly recommend this product and seller.

Disappointed,  I don't dry my clothes in the dryer I'm so glad I didn't.  The first time I washed it the material shrunk on one side.
